name: Open Research Data
description: Platform for freely accessible landscape research data, providing quality assessed data and their metadata such as context information on measurement objectives, equipment, methods, testing and investigation areas. Secures quality, integrity and long-term availability of landscape and ecosystem research data and enhances accessibility of free data from ZALF long-term monitoring campaigns, landscape laboratories, field trials and experiments.
owner_name: Leibniz Centre for Agricultural Landscape Research (ZALF)
